title: AI Disruption Prompts Ardian to Tighten Software Investment Criteria
description: French private equity firm Ardian said it may avoid certain types of private credit investments in software as the sector grapples with the challenges posed by the disruption from developments in artificial intelligence.
content:
French private equity firm Ardian said it may avoid certain types of private credit investments in software as the sector grapples with the challenges posed by the disruption from developments in artificial intelligence.

title: UBS Global Wealth CIO Says Ditch Coders for Builders as AI Booms
description: The threat to software-backed businesses from artificial intelligence should prompt investors to shift focus from technology to companies that toil in the physical world, like miners, power producers and industrial firms, according to Ulrike Hoffmann-Burchardi, global head of equities and chief investment officer for the Americas at UBS Wealth Management.
content: The threat to software-backed businesses from artificial intelligence should prompt investors to shift focus from technology to companies that toil in the physical world, like miners, power producers and industrial firms, according to Ulrike Hoffmann... [447 chars]

title: Time to deflate the AI doom bubble
description: In financial markets, nothing sells like doom. But recent fears about the disruptive potential of artificial intelligence have battered stock prices and investor sentiment so much that a reality check is warranted.
content: ORLANDO, Florida, Feb 25 (Reuters) - In financial markets, nothing sells like doom. But recent fears about the disruptive potential of artificial intelligence have battered stock prices and investor sentiment so much that a reality check is warranted... [3783 chars]

title: Citigroup Assembles Banking Team Focused on AI Infrastructure
description: Citigroup Inc. has formed a group focused on the artificial intelligence infrastructure boom comprised of leaders from its investment banking and corporate banking teams.
content:

title: Hacker Used Anthropic’s Claude to Steal Sensitive Mexican Data
description: A hacker exploited Anthropic PBC’s artificial intelligence chatbot to carry out a series of attacks against Mexican government agencies, resulting in the theft of a huge trove of sensitive tax and voter information, according to cybersecurity researchers.

description: Banco Santander SA Executive Chair Ana Botin is counting on artificial intelligence to provide more than €1 billion ($1.2 billion) to targets she’s set for the next years.
